Description:
WHEN POSITION AND COMFORT MEAN EVERYTHING
Drenched in natural light and offering convenience and comfort at its best, this town home situated in the heart of Craigieburn provides every amenity at your doorstep. Only minutes walk to Craigieburn Central, public transport, Splash Aquatic Leisure Centre, public golf course, schools & parklands.
Ideal for the first home buyer or astute investor, with its spacious floorplan & unbeatable location, the homes core living area is a real highlight with its free flowing design. Encompassing a sleek modern kitchen, fully equipped with massive island bench, an abundance of cupboard space and 900mm stainless steel appliances. The adjoining open plan meals / living area allows for large family gatherings and is complemented by an intimate landscaped courtyard.
Also comprises spacious bedrooms; master bedroom with built robe & ensuite. A modern central bathroom supports the remaining sleeping quarters. Also boasts powder room, ducted heating, multiple split systems and single car garage with internal access. Dont miss a rare opportunity to purchase a property which provides the convenience people dream for!
*Please note this address is for marketing purposes only - the title particulars refer to the property as 97 Lygon Drive, Craigieburn*
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*

Description:
QUALITY HOME THAT TICKS ALL THE BOXES
In the convenient and popular neighbourhood of The Woods Estate, this low maintenance full turnkey standalone home sits on a spacious 336sqm block of land that offers plenty of indoor and outdoor space for you and your family or lucky tenant.
Its smartly configured design consists of 3 spacious bedrooms with a master bedroom that has its own ensuite and walk in robe to the rear of the home for peace and quiet, 900mm appliances in kitchen with stone benchtop, open plan family/meals and a study at the front of the home for peaceful work at home days.
Further features include high ceilings, heating and cooling and blinds throughout.
Take the public transport at your doorstep or easily access major arterials for your daily commutes. With easy access to parks, childcare, local amenities as well as school and just opposite the growing and upcoming Merrifield shops and community, you do not want to miss out on this affordable opportunity.
Internal area
173m²

Description:
Neat and Cozy
This unique and enticing opportunity simply cannot be overlooked. 5 years young and located in a peaceful circuit, this home offers a fantastic floor plan while being within walking distance to parks, local shops, sports grounds, Aiken creek primary school and public transport.
With its well-designed floor plan on 350m2 approx. this home comprises of: 3 bedrooms, grand Master with an abundance of space plus private ensuite and walk in robe. Formal living area or children's lounge, chef kitchen with stone bench tops and stainless-steel appliances overlooking both family and dining zones. The central bathroom services both bedrooms 2 and 3 at the rear of the home whilst being easily accessible by guests who visit. Outside has been completed for you too with a welcoming low maintance garden and entertaining area. Extras include: ducted heating and split system cooling, laundry with storage and double remote garage with drive thru access.
This could become a great addition to any portfolio or move straight in and relax. With all of Craigieburn's facility's on offer at your fingertips.
Call Brad on 0401 581 984 to book an inspection today and see the possibility's this home has to offer.
*** Inspection via Private Appointment ONLY ***
** SOCIAL DISTANCING REGULATIONS AND CONDITIONS APPLY! **
** Please be advised that in an effort to reduce the spread of Coronavirus (COVID-19), we ask that if you have recently returned from any overseas travel, are feeling unwell or developing flu like symptoms or have been in contact with someone who is ill please contact us prior to inspecting this property so that we can arrange an alternative inspection option for you.***

Description:
Ex-Display Masterpiece on 512m2*
Set on a wonderfully wide allotment with lush landscaped gardens all-round, this single-level sensation (by Dennis Family Homes) delivers a lifestyle of luxury with its free-flowing design, multiple living/entertaining spaces & extensive list of upgraded features.
Designed to maximise light & space, the home's indulgent interior boasts an extra-large
master bedroom with dual walk-in robe & private ensuite, together with 3 additional bedrooms (built-in robes), study/home office & stylish two-way main bathroom.
Adding to its family credentials is a large formal lounge, separate rumpus/living room & vast open-plan living/dining area complemented by a superb Smeg-equipped kitchen complete with stone benchtops, soft-close drawers, mirrored splashback & adjoining butler's pantry.
An emphasis on quality & efficiency, the home also includes ducted heating & evaporative
cooling, alarm & CCTV, premium carpets, solar/gas hot water, LED lighting & double-glazed
windows, as well as a large laundry & excellent storage options.
Dual stacker doors reveal a fabulous al-fresco entertaining area & private back garden
surrounds, plus the added appeal of a remote-control double garage with internal entry.
In a thriving Waratah neighbourhood walking distance to Village Green parkland & close to the area's recreational facilities & community centre, it will also offer easy access to the future schools, retail & dining precincts as well as the Hume Freeway & Donnybrook Station.

Description:
Titled Land in the Beating Heart of Mickleham
Be the envy of your family and friends and take advantage of this perfect opportunity to secure land in the heart of Merrifield precinct. Build yourself a dream home and a better future, knowing that the planning of the surrounding community and infrastructure had been meticulously designed to ensure that all major services, conveniences and amenities are right at your fingertips. Your life here will be the picture of perfect, with a multitude of open spaces and community areas where you can meet and make friends with your new neighbours. Within a short walk from home you will be able to enjoy all the conveniences you would expect from a thriving new city hub.
Merrifield City will be at the beating heart of Mickleham and the area that surrounds. The first stage of the shopping centre will span 7,000m², hosting Coles and 25 specialty stores comprising both national and independent retailers. (Stage 1 is currently under construction and will open in late 2020)
From Merrifield...
• 1 Minute Walk to Pinnacle Park
• 2 Minute Walk to Future School and Recreation Precinct (Open Late 2021)
• 2 Minute Drive to Merrifield Town Centre: Coles & Specialty Stores (Open Late 2020)
• 4 Minute Drive to Hume Hwy
• 6 Bus Stops (route 525 - Connecting Craigieburn & Donnybrook stations, major shopping centres and most convenient amenities)
• 12 Min Drive to Craigieburn Station / 6 Min to Donnybrook Station
• 12 Min Drive to Highlands Shopping Centre
• 13 Min Drive to Craigieburn Central
• 40 Min Drive to CBD
This is the new capital of Melbourne's North! Don't delay, grab your slice of heaven today!

Description:
Appealing Charm in Sought After Pocket
Sale by Set Date | Thurs 2 Jul 5:30pm | Unless Sold Prior
An attractive street presence is just one of the impressive qualities of this appealing two bedroom residence, perfectly placed within close proximity to Hothlyn Drive shops and supermarket, schools and public transport. In a quiet court position, the home offers low maintenance living and quality finishes with an emphasis on indoor outdoor comfort. A sensible layout starts with a welcoming entry leading to a spacious living area and onto a well appointed dining/kitchen zone with natural light streaming through large windows. The dining space seamlessly merges to a sheltered paved entertaining patio. The roomy master bedroom has a walk-in-robe and enjoys direct access to the two way bathroom shared by the second robed bedroom. Features include ducted heating and cooling, split-system heating/cooling, ceiling fans, outdoor security blinds, garden shed and garage with rear roller door.
Within close proximity to public transport, Craigieburn South Primary School, Craigieburn Secondary College, local shops and supermarket, Hothlyn Drive Reserve, Craigieburn Gardens, Craigieburn Plaza Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Central and access to the Hume Freeway.
Photo ID Required at all Inspections.
To view the due diligence checklist for home and residential property buyers copy link
https://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Description:
Beautifully Quiet, Quietly Beautiful!
Situated in a quiet pocket of Craigieburn's most sought after locations & presented with love & pride, this impeccable home is sure to ignite your excitement. A fabulous decor, a bright & airy colour palette with a functional floor plan that complements an attractive facade & manicured gardens front to back.
It's smartly configured floor plan comprises a generous separate lounge, a fully equipped kitchen offering plenty of bench space which overlooks a spacious open plan meals area that effortlessly links outside to provide the ultimate indoor/outdoor integration. Sleeping quarters including 3 good sized bedrooms, master with built-in robe & ensuite, spacious central bathroom & separate toilet.
Step outside, fire up the BBQ & enjoy the home's perfect outdoor setting which provides peace & privacy whilst you entertain all seasons & even enough room for the kids to play out the back in complete privacy. Further features include a single remote garage, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, floating floorboards & so much more!
With its as-new feeling, this property is perfect for all first home buyers, investors or downsizers with its perfect proximity to local schools, shops & public transport. This home should definitely be on your must-have wishlist!

Description:
Opportunity Not To Miss!!!
If you are lucky enough to grab this opportunity and are handed the keys to this exceptional property, you could live the lavishes that Family life has to offer.
With Relaxed Décor and Seamless indoor - Light filled Open plan throughout, the well-crafted floor plan, allows each spacious area to flow effortlessly with plenty of room for everyone.
Featuring 4 beautifully appointed bedrooms.
This luxury property in a premier location offering you an outstanding lifestyle in stunning surroundings.
2 mins walk to kindergarten and primary School. Close proximity to tennis courts.
Luxury Inclusions-
. Wide entrance hall way
. Luxurious master bedroom with fully tiled ensuite and walk in robe
. Three remaining generously sized bedrooms
. Built in robes in all bedrooms
. Laundry wall cabinets
. Spacious, light filled dining area

Description:
A Great Opportunity
Located in the very popular Botanical Estate, amongst quality homes and beautiful parklands, this Beautiful home ticks all the boxes.
Comprising of 3 bedrooms, master bedrooms with en-suites, kitchen with quality stone bench tops stainless-steel appliances. The living area will fit the whole family whilst over looking the central dining area.
Other features include - ducted heating, Evap cooling, single lock up garage with remote control, low maintenance front and back gardens and much more. An inspection is a must and surely will not disappoint.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Located in one of the most sought after locations in Roxburgh Park Heights within close proximity to schools, shops and public transport. This beautiful double storey modern home offers the space, style and luxury for the growing family to enjoy!

Outside you will find a beautifully landscaped backyard, side driveway leading to a double garage with drive through access.

Little Real Estate is taking guidance from the Australian Government and will continue to put in place the necessary measures to protect the community during all upcoming OFIs.
Elegant, sunlit and spacious with street-front style, this stunning 2 bedroom townhouse offers low-maintenance boutique luxury in the heart of Craigieburn.

Located on the corner of Windrock Avenue and Grand Boulevard

Take full advantage of easy access to transport, Craigieburn Central, lush parkland, restaurants, cafes, and so much more!
For more information, please contact Alex Melnychuk today.

Description:
Contemporary Class in A Plus Location
Enjoying a tranquil aspect, yet in the heart of Craigieburn, this impressively proportioned two bedroom townhouse is well-suited for owner occupiers and investors alike. A smart floorplan presents an upstairs light-filled kitchen with expansive open plan living and dining area with split-system heating and cooling. A sliding glass door leads from the living area to the balcony and timber pergola, with a northerly aspect, which boasts plentiful space for entertaining. The clever design will impress with a well-appointed kitchen featuring island bench with breakfast bar, stainless steel appliances including gas cooktop, electric oven, rangehood, dishwasher, easy care tiled splashbacks, pantry and plenty of storage. Two good sized bedrooms, with built-in-robes, contemporary tiled bathroom with vanity and toilet, overlooking the internal courtyard. Extras include European laundry, undercover porch, front garden and single remote lockup garage with internal access. This spacious townhouse is situated only a short distance to the Highlands Shopping Centre, Mount Ridley College, Highgate Recreation Reserve and public transport.

Description:
One more SOLD by SKAD !! 5 buyers still looking !!
Loving your home is about more than just where you live or what your house looks like, it is about having confidence that you made the right choice for your home to reflect your personal style.
Well, look no further, this lovely home is thoughtfully designed for a lifestyle of sophisticated First Home Luxury, complemented with the finest interior features.
The inviting covered entry leads to an impressive foyer, drawing the eye to the bright, elegant living room and dining room.
The well-appointed kitchen features a large pure marble island used at times as a convenient breakfast bar for informal dining, with plenty of counters and cabinet space, complimented with a desirable second kitchen. The picture-perfect and deluxe living/family area offering stylish touches and comfort for your convenience.
The gorgeous master bedroom is both elegant and warmly inviting, enhanced by a large walk-in closet, en-suite with modern vanity, luxe shower with eye-catching floor to ceiling modern easy to maintain tiles.
Each of the two secondary bedrooms is equally warm and welcoming and designed for stylish comfort and convenience.
In years to come, you will be glad you purchased this lovely family home nestled in the peaceful pocket of the Craigieburn which is a place that makes you feel like you can escape, but at the same time find everything you need at your fingertips.
Call before it's SOLD !!
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Accordingly, all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.

Description:
PRESENTATION + POSITION = PERFECT
With quiet residential surrounds and a stones throw away to Craigieburns major amenities, this generously proportioned renovated home offers convenient and care-free living, an ideal opportunity for first-time home buyers, downsizers and investors to capture a home that exudes the best in style and practicality.
The deceiving floor plan is a pleasant surprise with the huge open plan lounge, dining and kitchen area being the heart of the home. Equipped with a charming exposed brick wall this impressive and spacious zone is complimented by sliding stacker doors leading to an intimate courtyard with eco decking, the ideal outdoor entertaining haven. This home includes three bedrooms with built-in robes, separate laundry, central bathroom with tub, split system heating/cooling, new ducted heating system with 7 year warranty, solar panels, intercom and single car garage with drive through access to a carport.
Located minutes walk to medical centres, Craigieburn Plaza, and public transport, i.e. Craigieburn train station, and local bus service, reserves, and an impressive selection of schools. This quality property offers an enriching and convenient suburban lifestyle in an established and much-loved locale.
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*
